target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: No findings were reported by the audit, so the target vulnerability (reentrancy in withdraw function via ERC-777 hooks) was not identified at all.

notes: The audit reported 0 findings, meaning it completely missed the reentrancy vulnerability in the withdraw function. The vulnerability exists because withdraw transfers tokens (line 51) before updating the internal balance state (lines 54-55), and ERC-777 tokens can trigger callbacks (tokensToSend hook) during transfer, allowing an attacker to recursively call withdraw before their balance is decremented.
